channel.title: [Video] Full Signature Tutorial - Ep 2 Series 1
channel.description:
Outcome - [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img184.imageshack.us/img184/7054/tutgi2.jpg[/img][/URL]
What you need - This is shown in the video before we start. Pause it so you can collect them up. The C4Ds really do need to be colourful!
Video - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=255QXK26
Video notes - Photoshop was good to me this time and didn't freeze :) Next episode I will lay a few easy listening tracks on to the video. This type of signature is mainly for people who have just started Photoshop. Ep 3 will be a completely different style using just the defaults xD
Enjoy :)

item.title: [Video] Full Signature Tutorial - Ep 2 Series 1
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

Sweet. I like this tutorial, (just like all therest of them :P).

Well, the render I picked was a bit to big, so the result wasn’t that good though. But I’ll remember that for next time. xP

Thanks!

Read full topic
